snippet: Employers added 287,000 jobs in June, a robust pace that suggested a resilient economy recovering from a slump early in the year....
abstract: Stocks rocket to nearly record highs, following good June job market report.
lead_paragraph: Employers added 287,000 jobs in June, a robust pace that suggested a resilient economy recovering from a slump early in the year.

headline.main: Wall St. Rises After Rousing Jobs Report
headline.print_headline: Rousing Jobs Report Sends Wall St. Soaring
